doc.title: Chili Con Corny
doc.plot: Woody is driving a dune buggy over large sand dunes in the middle of nowhere. Eager for a mouthful of food, he stops at Mrs. Meany's Cafe. There is one item on the menu-- chili and beans, which Woody orders. The chili is extremely hot, causing flames and smoke to shoot out of Woody's mouth. He runs outside to a water trough and pours water over his head. Mrs. Meany accuses him of trying to leave without paying, and orders him to wash dishes. Hijinks ensue.
